25  SFML()
26  {
27  m_Canvas = NULL;
28  m_MouseX = 0;

32  void Initialize(Gwen::Controls::Canvas* c)

37  unsigned char TranslateKeyCode(int iKeyCode)
38  {
39  switch (iKeyCode)
40  {
41 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
42 
43  case sf::Keyboard::BackSpace:
44  return Gwen::Key::Backspace;
45 
46  case sf::Keyboard::Return:
47  return Gwen::Key::Return;
48 
49  case sf::Keyboard::Escape:
50  return Gwen::Key::Escape;
51 
52  case sf::Keyboard::Tab:
53  return Gwen::Key::Tab;
54 
55  case sf::Keyboard::Space:
56  return Gwen::Key::Space;
57 
58  case sf::Keyboard::Up:
59  return Gwen::Key::Up;
60 
61  case sf::Keyboard::Down:
62  return Gwen::Key::Down;
63 
64  case sf::Keyboard::Left:
65  return Gwen::Key::Left;
66 
67  case sf::Keyboard::Right:
68  return Gwen::Key::Right;
69 
70  case sf::Keyboard::Home:
71  return Gwen::Key::Home;
72 
73  case sf::Keyboard::End:
74  return Gwen::Key::End;
75 
76  case sf::Keyboard::Delete:
77  return Gwen::Key::Delete;
78 
79  case sf::Keyboard::LControl:
80  return Gwen::Key::Control;
81 
82  case sf::Keyboard::LAlt:
83  return Gwen::Key::Alt;
84 
85  case sf::Keyboard::LShift:
86  return Gwen::Key::Shift;
87 
88  case sf::Keyboard::RControl:
89  return Gwen::Key::Control;
90 
91  case sf::Keyboard::RAlt:
92  return Gwen::Key::Alt;
93 
94  case sf::Keyboard::RShift:
95  return Gwen::Key::Shift;
96 #else // if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
97 
98  case sf::Key::Back:
99  return Gwen::Key::Backspace;
100 
101  case sf::Key::Return:
102  return Gwen::Key::Return;
103 
104  case sf::Key::Escape:
105  return Gwen::Key::Escape;
106 
107  case sf::Key::Tab:
108  return Gwen::Key::Tab;
109 
110  case sf::Key::Space:
111  return Gwen::Key::Space;
112 
113  case sf::Key::Up:
114  return Gwen::Key::Up;
115 
116  case sf::Key::Down:
117  return Gwen::Key::Down;
118 
119  case sf::Key::Left:
120  return Gwen::Key::Left;
121 
122  case sf::Key::Right:
123  return Gwen::Key::Right;
124 
125  case sf::Key::Home:
126  return Gwen::Key::Home;
127 
128  case sf::Key::End:
129  return Gwen::Key::End;
130 
131  case sf::Key::Delete:
132  return Gwen::Key::Delete;
133 
134  case sf::Key::LControl:
135  return Gwen::Key::Control;
136 
137  case sf::Key::LAlt:
138  return Gwen::Key::Alt;
139 
140  case sf::Key::LShift:
141  return Gwen::Key::Shift;
142 
143  case sf::Key::RControl:
144  return Gwen::Key::Control;
145 
146  case sf::Key::RAlt:
147  return Gwen::Key::Alt;
148 
149  case sf::Key::RShift:
150  return Gwen::Key::Shift;
151 #endif // if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
152  }
153 
154  return Gwen::Key::Invalid;
155  }
156 
157  bool ProcessMessage(sf::Event& event)
158  {
159  if (!m_Canvas)
160  return false;
161 
162 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
163 
164  switch (event.type)
165 #else
166 
167  switch (event.Type)
168 #endif
169  {
170  case sf::Event::MouseMoved:
171  {
172 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
173  int dx = event.mouseMove.x-m_MouseX;
174  int dy = event.mouseMove.y-m_MouseY;
175  m_MouseX = event.mouseMove.x;
176  m_MouseY = event.mouseMove.y;
177 #else
178  int dx = event.MouseMove.X-m_MouseX;
179  int dy = event.MouseMove.Y-m_MouseY;
180  m_MouseX = event.MouseMove.X;
181  m_MouseY = event.MouseMove.Y;
182 #endif
183  return m_Canvas->InputMouseMoved(m_MouseX, m_MouseY, dx, dy);
184  }
185 
186  case sf::Event::MouseButtonPressed:
187  case sf::Event::MouseButtonReleased:
188 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
189  return m_Canvas->InputMouseButton(event.mouseButton.button,
190  event.type ==
191  sf::Event::MouseButtonPressed);
192 #else
193  return m_Canvas->InputMouseButton(event.MouseButton.Button,
194  event.Type ==
195  sf::Event::MouseButtonPressed);
196 #endif
197 
198  case sf::Event::MouseWheelMoved:
199 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
200  return m_Canvas->InputMouseWheel(event.mouseWheel.delta*60);
201 #else
202  return m_Canvas->InputMouseWheel(event.MouseWheel.Delta*60);
203 #endif
204 
205  case sf::Event::TextEntered:
206 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
207  return m_Canvas->InputCharacter(event.text.unicode);
208 #else
209  return m_Canvas->InputCharacter(event.Text.Unicode);
210 #endif
211 
212  case sf::Event::KeyPressed:
213  case sf::Event::KeyReleased:
214  {
215 #if SFML_VERSION_MAJOR == 2
216  bool bPressed = (event.type == sf::Event::KeyPressed);
217  char keyCode = event.key.code;
218  bool control = event.key.control;
219 #else
220  bool bPressed = (event.Type == sf::Event::KeyPressed);
221  char keyCode = event.Key.Code;
222  bool control = event.Key.Control;
223 #endif
224 
225  if (control && bPressed && keyCode >= 'a' && keyCode <= 'z')
226  return m_Canvas->InputCharacter(keyCode);
227 
228  unsigned char iKey = TranslateKeyCode(keyCode);
229  return m_Canvas->InputKey(iKey, bPressed);
230  }
231  }
232 
233  return false;
234  }
235 
236  protected:
237 
238  Gwen::Controls::Canvas* m_Canvas;
239  int m_MouseX;
240  int m_MouseY;
241 
242  };
243 
244 
245  }
246 }
247 #endif // ifndef GWEN_INPUT_SFML_H
